channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）重申了她的预期，即在利率维持在当前水平的情况下，通胀率将继续进一步下降，但她表示现在开始降息还为时过早。
item.description:
Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman repeated her expectation that inflation will continue to decline further with interest rates held at their current level, but said it’s too soon to begin rate cuts. https://t.co/bCbdGb5PWI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 即使在人工智能大行其道的当下，交易员们仍将数十亿资金投入到一个久经考验的 ETF 基金中，该基金只购买提供健康现金流的公司。
item.description:
Even with all the AI euphoria, traders are pouring billions into a tried-and-tested ETF that simply buys companies offering healthy cash flows https://t.co/8XbiGR6Q3M

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 正在向银行征求意见，计划最快于第三季度在美国进行 200 亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description:
Swedish fintech Klarna is sounding out banks for a $20 billion US IPO as soon as the third quarter, sources say https://t.co/uI42K4LT2n

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行和新斯科舍银行的盈利因消费者和企业在严峻的经济形势下日益紧缩的现金而受到影响
item.description:
Earnings at Bank of Montreal and Bank of Nova Scotia were marred by increasingly cash-strapped consumers and businesses amid a challenging economic landscape https://t.co/NiVe6vYaqY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 总部位于伦敦的仓库开发商 Segro 希望通过出售新股筹集多达 8 亿英镑（10 亿美元）的资金
item.description:
London-based warehouse developer Segro is looking to raise as much as £800 million ($1 billion) by selling new shares https://t.co/6m1OfmCn2Y

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）正在洽谈从媒体集团拉加代尔（Lagardere）手中收购法国时尚杂志《巴黎竞赛》（Paris Match）。
item.description:
Luxury giant LVMH is in talks to buy French glossy magazine Paris Match from media conglomerate Lagardere https://t.co/HnYRhbwKIr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 作为运动员，赚取十亿美元从未如此容易。
item.description:
It's never been easier to make a billion dollars as an athlete. https://t.co/qXk8L8WEHx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国金融科技平台 PrimaryBid 计划裁员约 25%，原因是交易量下滑
item.description:
UK fintech platform PrimaryBid plans to cut about 25% of staff amid a slump in dealmaking https://t.co/OSWVEOrBC3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 德意志银行希望员工从 6 月起每周工作三天，但工会称这一政策变化面临 "巨大阻力"。
item.description:
Deutsche Bank wants staff back in the office three days a week from June, but unions say there is "enormous resistance" to the policy change https://t.co/c1Zsn7WPxy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 荷兰芯片设备制造商 ASM 继续受益于中国需求，季度收入超出预期
item.description:
Dutch chip-equipment maker ASM continued to benefit from Chinese demand with quarterly revenue topping estimates https://t.co/0SpE3fLEdU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 八达通首席执行官表示，即使在能源价格降低的情况下，英国能源账单欠供应商的债务仍在增加
item.description:
Debt owed to suppliers on UK energy bills is growing even with lower energy prices, says the CEO of Octopus https://t.co/seWbXAWuck

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 拜登向国会领导人施压，要求避免政府部分关门，因为他们聚集在白宫，达成协议的时间已经不多了
item.description:
Biden presses congressional leaders to avoid a partial government shutdown, as they gathered at the White House with time running out to reach a deal https://t.co/SCSINBIaiT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿波罗首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）说，最好的投资者都在新加坡和阿联酋等地运作，他认为美国的机构已经过于注重基准了
item.description:
Apollo CEO Marc Rowan said the best investors operate in places such as Singapore and the United Arab Emirates, contending US institutions have become too focused on benchmarks https://t.co/jFVae9jCI3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统的总统令在参议院遭到越来越多的反对，导致该总统令有可能在下周的例行会议上被推翻。
item.description:
Growing opposition to President Javier Milei’s presidential decree in the Senate puts it at risk of being overturned as regular sessions get underway next week https://t.co/mgb4pBstB1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在下周的财政预算案中，英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）必须在增加税收与经济增长之间取得平衡。另外：Shein 在伦敦上市的潜在 "毒杯"。与@h_chandlerwilde一起获取最新消息
item.description:
With the Budget next week, UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt must balance the need to raise tax revenues with growing the economy. Plus: the potential "poison chalice" of Shein listing in London. Get The Readout with @h_chandlerwilde https://t.co/RjJVVL9pFw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚积极提高利率并承诺走出目前的 "困境"，为恢复人们对遭受重创的奈拉的信心迈出了重要一步
item.description:
Nigeria took a vital step toward restoring confidence in the battered naira by aggressively raising rates and pledging to dig the country out of its present "mess" https://t.co/1l8qel6IJp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 就在美国财政部对 14 艘俄罗斯船只实施新制裁几天后，两艘油轮似乎停止了在希腊海岸的航行
item.description:
Two oil tankers appeared to stop what they were doing off the coast of Greece just a few days after the US Treasury imposed fresh sanctions on 14 Russian ships https://t.co/cY4KRIILT8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯资助的电竞组织 ESL FACEIT 将裁员 15
item.description:
The Saudi Arabia-funded esports organization ESL FACEIT is cutting 15% of its staff https://t.co/N4I56mM2Ge

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 南非推迟关闭燃煤电厂，但坚称将实现排放目标
item.description:
South Africa is delaying closing down coal-fired plants but insists it will meet its emission targets https://t.co/iYY8lq4zta

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 投资者期待着 @Cenbank 行长 @Dr.YemiCardoso 大幅加息。他没有让人失望。这对经济和 NGN/USD 意味着什么？
item.description:
Investors were looking to @cenbank Governor @DrYemiCardoso to deliver a massive rate hike. And he didn't disappoint. A 🧵on what does it mean for the economy and the NGN/USD https://t.co/SSejj3iuKn

— arijit ghosh (@KHASBAAT) February 27, 2024

item.title: 埃克森美孚公司表示正在考虑采取一项措施，以拆散这两家公司价值 530 亿美元的合并，并增加其在圭亚那巨型近海石油储备中的份额，此后雪佛龙和赫斯的股价下滑
item.description:
Shares of Chevron and Hess slipped after Exxon Mobil said it’s considering a move that could break up the companies’ $53 billion merger and increase its share of Guyana’s giant offshore oil reserves https://t.co/Sovdh0DeUY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 巴西的即时支付系统在国内迅速走红，自 2020 年底由巴西中央银行推出以来，用户已超过 1.6 亿。现在，巴西计划将其推向全球
item.description:
Brazil’s instant-payment system has quickly become a hit at home, with more than 160 million users since it was launched by the central bank in late 2020. Now the plan is to take it global https://t.co/QINdApb2L1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 由前高盛合伙人唐-马伦（Don Mullen）领导的美国房地产巨头 Pretium 将向猎人点资本（Hunter Point Capital）出售该公司的少数股权，以寻求资金支持开展新项目。
item.description:
Pretium, the US housing giant led by former Goldman Sachs partner Don Mullen, is selling a minority stake in the firm to Hunter Point Capital as it seeks financial muscle for new initiatives https://t.co/c8XORcZJFm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）正在逐步减少向加拿大客户发放的超长抵押贷款，以帮助他们应对利率的快速上升。
item.description:
Bank of Montreal is slowly whittling down a pile of ultra-long mortgages that it granted to Canadian customers to help them handle the rapid rise in interest rates https://t.co/TR536gwSoO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 约什-哈里斯和大卫-布利茨即将把匹兹堡钢人队的少数股份出售给阿特-鲁尼和托马斯-图尔领导的集团
item.description:
Josh Harris and David Blitzer are close to selling their Pittsburgh Steelers minority stake to a group led by Art Rooney and Thomas Tull https://t.co/ATVJllSiAm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国央行可能会出售在量化宽松政策下购买的所有英国国债，以更好地应对未来的危机，此举将使其与美联储产生分歧
item.description:
The BOE may sell all the UK government bonds bought under quantitative easing to better prepare for a future crisis, a move that would put it at odds with the Fed https://t.co/Ub3PVE1pR0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 欧盟立法者警告欧洲央行，其重新控制通胀的能力危及欧洲央行的信誉
item.description:
EU lawmakers warn the ECB that its credibility is at stake over its ability to get inflation back under control https://t.co/OYVgoKvvE5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚奈拉今年下跌超过 40%，大幅加息可能会改变奈拉的走势
item.description:
A substantial interest-rate hike may have shifted the odds for the Nigerian naira after the currency declined more than 40% this year https://t.co/UHQmNPHZ78

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 谷歌在人工智能图像中使用不同纳粹形象的失误为大科技公司敲响了警钟
item.description:
Google’s stumble with AI images of diverse Nazis is a wake-up call for Big Tech https://t.co/g5O6jT5jmf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 由于美国人对经济前景、就业市场和金融状况的看法恶化，2 月份美国消费者信心指数出现了四个月来的首次下滑。
item.description:
US consumer confidence fell in February for the first time in four months as Americans’ views deteriorated about the outlook for the economy, the job market and financial conditions. https://t.co/iDPHd9yhaY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024
